titleStmt.title: The copie of the sermon preached before the Vniversitie at S. Maries in Oxford, on Tuesday the XXIV. of Decemb. 1633. By Tho. Browne, one of the students of Christ-church
titleStmt.author: Browne, Thomas, 1604?-1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
